title: How to write an informal essay - Quora

response.answer_text: Informal essay is a type of essay that differs greatly from other type of essays. Mainly informal essay is written for enjoyment. This is not to say that it cannot be informative or persuasive; however, it is less a formal statement. Steps for writing an informal essay are: Select the topicWrite an informal outline for essayWrite the main body of the essayWrite the ConclusionProofread and Edit

Read my book that champions using conversational language and strong emotional and rational arguments: “Secrets of writing killer essays & reports.” It’s available from Amazon in almost every country on the planet. Reading that and working through some exercises will improve your writing.
